subject: Basketball (College)
Iraq War (2003-11)
lead_paragraph: Bernard James, a 27-year-old senior for Florida State who served in Iraq while in the Air Force, is considered one of the best defensive players in the Atlantic Coast Conference.
snippet: Bernard James, a 27-year-old senior for Florida State who served in Iraq while in the Air Force, is considered one of the best defensive players in the Atlantic Coast Conference.
